website_summaries.verdict: Costs a little more than some models, but will give you amazing comfort levels.
pros: Uses a PWR Cool insole to keep your feel feeling cool after a full day of walking
Rubber sole has some flex to it, which makes it more comfortable than other golf shoe models
Offered in several different color combinations
cons: Shoes don't seem to repel water as well as the manufacturer claims

customer_reviews.title: Sewing coming apart at the front tounge after 2 rounds?
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 rounds and the tounge sewing in the front where it attaches to the top of the show is already coming apart. I have asked for a refund and have yet to hear back. I would like the manufacturer to replace the shoes with new ones. I will reply with better feedback if I hear back from Amazon or the manufacturer. Seems pretty cheap this would occur when my footjoys are 12 years old and have held up wonderfully. Needed a new show and so far - no good. that's a lot of money for 2 rounds and see failure in the product.
customer_reviews.author: GoAngus

customer_reviews.title: These are quite possibly the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are quite possibly the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn. They seem to be really stable during the swing and support me on slopped terrain. This is my first set of pumas and probably won't be my last. They run the same size as my dress shoes but fit big compared to my Mizuno running shoes. I am unsure how they work in really wet conditions. I am debating on buying a second pair just for backup purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Chas Nick

customer_reviews.title: First time trying Puma’s......won’t be the last
customer_reviews.text: I play at least once a week and therefore have several shoes I rotate through based on conditions and color. I needed a black pair to replace my Adidas Tour 360 as they were several year old. I own Footjoy DNA’s and a couple pairs of Adidas they were much more expensive and these were these were without a doubt the most comfortable pair I have ever worn. Very stable and surprisingly light for as sturdy as they are. Of course they look sleek much like my FJ DNA’s but about $50 less. Will be getting another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great show
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great show. The material holds up well in wet conditions, I didn't feel like they got heavier after an hour of walking in some wet grass. Turf interaction is solid in the fairways and rough. I'm a size 13 in my Adidas, however these are a little bigger. If you prefer a more snug fit, I'd look at a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Great product, comfort outstanding. 2nd pair of same style this time in different colour. Best shoes ever, first pair c. 2 months in, confirm fully waterproof - playing in Ireland so conditions very heavy/wet at times.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kearney

customer_reviews.title: GOT THESE SHOES IN FEBUARY OF THIS YEAR AND ALREADY ...
customer_reviews.text: GOT THESE SHOES IN FEBUARY OF THIS YEAR AND ALREADY THE STITCHING IS COMING UNDONE AROUND THE BLUE STRIP ON THE SIDE. VERY VERY DISSATIFIED WITH THESE SHOES!!!!!!! WILL TELL ALL MY GOLFING BUDDYS HOW MUCH THESE SHOES SUX, AND I WILL STICK WITH MY FOOTJOY'S.!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle story

customer_reviews.title: They're the shape of rental dress shoes like the kind you get with a wedding rental
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are extremely pointy. They're the shape of rental dress shoes like the kind you get with a wedding rental.
customer_reviews.author: McMicky

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had an exact pair of white shoes so since I needed a pair of black shoes I bought the same shoe I had previously. Love the look, comfort, and quality. Can’t imagine a better shoe for the price. Added benefit to me are the shoe laces, they stay tied!
customer_reviews.author: PA Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: A well made, very comfortable and stylish golf shoe. I am delighted after one round in these and look forward to wearing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Right shoes for narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes after seeing a review from somebody who wore narrow size shoes and said these fit perfectly. I have long skinny feet as well and the review was right. These fit great! Now I'm stuck with a pair of FJ's that are too wide, even though they were size D width. These are very comfortable as well. I recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: John V

customer_reviews.title: longer toe than expected
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband he said the only problem was that they were slightly longer than expected
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Puma rocks !!
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoes !! These are my second pair Love puma . Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shoes. Fit perfectly right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Terrific shoes. Fit perfectly right out of the box. Very supportive, great look and very supportive. I'm very pleased .
customer_reviews.author: Good Judge

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, narrower and I need it!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, narrower, and I need it. Very comfortable, light for leather shoe.
customer_reviews.author: TR3

customer_reviews.title: These Puma golf shoes will not disappoint. Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. True leather golf shoes are getting harder to find.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Have only worn for 1 round, but fit as expected and were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: dr glue

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are sweet..
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are sweet...I was really excited when I open the box...they are some of the best looking golf shoes I have seen in awhile. They are so comfortable...for 100 bucks you would think you bought a 200 dollar pair of golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Morgandonor

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. A little slim fitting. But that is Puma anyways. Always buy a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Brent E.

customer_reviews.title: A bit stiff. Ive realized that shoes arent for ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit stiff. Ive realized that shoes arent for me with golf and I can ONLY wear tennis. Sketchers go golf= As soft as a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write positive or negative reviews, because I expect the product to be fine. I can say these shoes are the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever had. The only complaint are the shoe laces. They work for now, but expect them to break at some point due to weather. I could be wrong. Overall, great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ben V

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Sweet looking shoes and very comfortable. I have a wide foot and all other pairs of my golf shoes are FootJoys. I was a bit worried about how the Puma's would fit but was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe. I tried at home
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. I tried at home. Comfortable. I'll try it in the course tomorrow. They're so nice that they HAVE to be good !
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look, excellent fit, better than expected. Would buy and recommend over and over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: T. H. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the most comfortable golf shoe I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and comfortablele golf shoe Definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: F. W. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes no break in needed. First time I wore them they felt perfect and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine O.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot. Fit well and right out of the box they didn't feel like they had to be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rose

customer_reviews.title: quite impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Can't even complain about these shoes Being narrow because I have a wider than average foot. I expect them to fit better after a few rounds. And if they don't, I will mount them and hang them in my man cave, because they are that gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Well constructed and well worth the money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get these PUMAs on sale @ half price, so it was a great value for the money! I'd buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have been wearing Puma for many years but this is my first pair of golf shoes. Can't wait to wear them on the course this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Martiny Jr

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with the shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were bought as a gift and my boyfriend said they fit just as he thought they would. He is very happy with the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great but narrow
customer_reviews.text: The length is great but their a little narrow. I have other puma golf shoes that aren’t that tight on the sides of my feet. But they look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: greg roberts

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe, look great
customer_reviews.text: They are fantastic shoes. I'm in between sizes and 10.5 was just slightly too snug. Love the look of them, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these golf shoes....
customer_reviews.text: I own a blue striped pair as well, so I knew they were a great golf shoe. Looks sweet and wears well....
customer_reviews.author: Larry Whobrey II

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my new PUMA golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: America's Brightest Orange. I am in love with my new PUMA golf shoes. Arrived quick and look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction and looks sharp. They are slightly narrow but just slightly. Real leather so they will most likely stretch to fit.
customer_reviews.author: MeBV

customer_reviews.title: One of the best golf shoes so far
customer_reviews.text: One of the best golf shoes so far. Nice to walk, excellent grip. Very good golf shoe. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Kuppusamy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly very comfortable and gives a great advantage with more cleats to turn the body and foot
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Just walked 18 on hilly course
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Just walked 18 on hilly course. Very comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NYCGUY

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits well and looks good. additionally I got the shoe on sale at a great price. All around good deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: New golfer

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty sweet looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty sweet looking shoes. I usually bounce between a size 9 or 8 1/2 shoe and based on everything I read I choose the 8.5 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Robichaud

customer_reviews.title: Great match for my navy blue wardrobe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Get lots of compliments on them too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great look and comfortable. Nice snug fit that's becoming more comfortable as I break them in. Clean up well. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Maschal

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and I expect them to perform fine
customer_reviews.text: Have not worn them yet. Fit great and I expect them to perform fine.
customer_reviews.author: Spook40

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves them. The fit is great and they look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the shoe at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the shoe at all! Wore one time and the shoe completely loss it’s shape! Won’t recommend to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like Pumas style and flair.
customer_reviews.text: I like Pumas style and flair. Others I've had usually break in nicely. I would order in a wide if available but usually they are only available in a medium width.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kerber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn..... I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: tony russo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but haven't had a chance to golf in them yet. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: .338Edge

customer_reviews.title: They fit great. I Love these
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use there. They fit great. I Love these.
customer_reviews.author: MelLac

customer_reviews.title: Geeat fit and feel.
customer_reviews.text: They fit and feel great. I have narrow feet and was worried that they would fit too loose but they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes for the price. Fit good but did have some discomfort in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: michael cooney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these shoes....they fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes! They run about half size big than puma street shoes and puma golf bio fusion.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his new golf shoes! And he is very picky!
customer_reviews.author: LivyMango

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite shoes EVER
customer_reviews.text: Been golfing for almost 40 years. These are my favorite shoes EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just take my money!
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of these sexy golf shoes will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the fit and overall quality
customer_reviews.text: My First puma golf shoes. Very happy with the fit and overall quality. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: 9ball

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very comfy walked 18 the day after I got them and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: David Bedard

customer_reviews.title: Nice, light, real leather shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light, very firm sole, which I like. They are not waterproof any longer. This may be due to my younger brother, with slightly larger feet wearing them for one round. But, now I can't wear them for a morning round - or my feet get wet.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Shilling

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and comfort for my high arch
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 pairs. Love the fit and comfort for my high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.  I love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Very comfortable walking right out of the box, and excellent grip, and good looking, and... did I mention that I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Look good fit well
customer_reviews.text: Look good fit well. Although Puma says these shoes are two year water proof my socks were wet at the toes after first wear. Will keep shoes for golf on dry days.
customer_reviews.author: patrick a trudell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, looks like great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, looks like great quality. I put them on right away and walked a very hilly 18. I wear orthotics and these shoes felt awesome. I had absolutely no hot spots or pinching at all. In fact I was texting friends how great the shoes fit and performed. Very firm footing after a week of rain..I would highly recommend..enjoy! Go Puma!
customer_reviews.author: Jacopa

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit fine and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit fine and are comfortable. However, they squeak when I walk. I think the problem is in the upper part of the shoe around the lace area. I have worn them a few times hoping that would help break them in, but there has been no change. I am very disappointed because otherwise they would have been a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puma fans will love these
customer_reviews.text: If you're used to wearing Puma's street shoes, the Titantour Ignite series of golf shoes will feel right at home while you're on the golf course. I got these without trying them on at a local store based off of brand loyalty, and I struck a home run. They fit great, albeit just a tad wide. They have great thickness and good arch support (as someone who is flat footed, this is always a good thing!), and the front of the foot has a nice feature where there is plastic covering the toe for extra protection. Having traditional spikes, these shoes will require constant cleaning on the shoe cleaners around the course if you are playing after a rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kruckeberg

customer_reviews.title: i would like to return them
customer_reviews.text: the sides of the shoes rubbed against my ankles,in no time i had to take them off,,,,,,,,,,i would like to return them,,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: brother buzzard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I selected 9 instead 8 1/2 just in case. I get what I expect it
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Lucena

customer_reviews.title: I knew they looked killer, but I didn't expect them to be THAT comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Unreal comfortable... this is my first pair of Puma Golf shoes... I will be buying another...
customer_reviews.author: NGoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. My game didn't improve, but I look good!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shelton

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Titantour Ignite Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
The Puma Titantour Ignite golf shoes are designed with Puma's PWRFRAME which is a lightweight durable midsole that gives your feet flexibility and traction along with the DUOFLEX grooves that give your feet support and a full range of motion. The Titantour Ignite shoes provide amazing comfort with the DZ insole and IGNITE foam midsole which both provide lightweight support and durability. 

Features:

 * Full grain leather upper
 * PWRCOOL technology
 * DZ insole
 * IGNITE foam midsole
 * PWRFRAME
 * DUOFLEX
 * GripZone Traction
 * 2-year waterproof warranty 
 *
